alert.note: Alert for Clay (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 12 at 2:54AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Clay and northeastern Dunklin Counties through 315 AM CST... At 254 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Campbell, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Malden, Piggott, Campbell, Rector, Chalk Bluff Natural Area, Clarkton, Holcomb, St. Francis, Pollard, Greenway, Saint Francis, Nimmons, Heubner, Leonard, Bell City, Pratt, Hargrave Corner, Carryville, Holly Island and Rhyne. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
